name: 34 - T02 - Dead (splash)
author: Njc5YzFjZDI5NjZl
command:
let params =
    [{
        filterType: "splash",
        filterId: "mySplash",
        color: 0x900505,
        padding: 30,
        time: Math.random()*1000,
        seed: Math.random()/100,
        splashFactor: 2,
        spread: 7,
        blend: 1,
        dimX: 1,
        dimY: 1,
        cut: true,
        textureAlphaBlend: false
    }];

await TokenMagic.addUpdateFiltersOnSelected(params);
